translation.en: Calling all trains!
♪ All aboard Let's make tracks ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
translation.it: Tutti in carrozza, si parte! Mighty Express!

translation.en: ♪ Mighty strong and mighty fast ♪
♪ Mighty, Mighty Express ♪
♪ Put our crew to the test ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ It's Mighty time ♪
♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪
♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪
♪ Mega Mission to the max ♪
♪ Let's make tracks ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪
[narrator] A Mighty Christmas!
[Nico] Christmas is tonight! All we need is snow!
translation.it: Stanotte sarà Natale! Manca solo la neve!

translation.en: And there. Hmm.
Is it Christmas yet? Huh? Huh? Huh?
Almost, Flicker! Pretty soon the whole town will be here
translation.it: Quasi, Flicker. Stanno arrivando tutti per la festa di Natale.

translation.en: for the big Christmas party.
translation.it: Stanno arrivando tutti per la festa di Natale.

translation.en: Then we'd better decorate faster!
Did someone say, "Fast, fast, faster?"
Oops! Sorry, Nico! I'm just so excited for Christmas!
translation.it: Scusa, Nico. Sono così emozionato per il Natale.

translation.en: Me, too!
Whoa! Looking Christmassy, Nico!
Nice job, everyone.
Now let's set up the spot for the Christmas tree.
translation.it: Ora troviamo un posto per l'albero.

translation.en: Allow me to introduce myself.
I'm Mandy Mail, the best mail delivery train in town!
translation.it: Sono Mandy la Postina, la migliore postina in città!

translation.en: If you need anything delivered, I'm your train!
Mandy is the newest member of the Mighty Express.
translation.it: Mandy è il nuovo membro del team.

translation.en: And this is her mail carrier pigeon friend, Flap!
translation.it: Lui è Flap, il suo piccione.

translation.en: [all] Hiya! Welcome to the team!
-[comm alert] -Carrie to Max!
Hi, Carrie!
I need help with a delivery at Mail Station. Could you send a train?
translation.it: Ho una consegna da spedire. Mi mandi un treno?

translation.en: I've got it! Super-special, extra-important delivery coming right up!
translation.it: Ci penso io! Consegna super speciale in arrivo!

translation.en: Dear Santa, for Christmas
I would love a special delivery of an orange-and-green soccer ball.
translation.it: vorrei tanto ricevere un pallone da calcio arancione e verde.

translation.en: That would be first class.
translation.it: Sarebbe il massimo! Con affetto, Carrie."

translation.en: Love, Carrie. Signed and sealed!
translation.it: Sarebbe il massimo! Con affetto, Carrie." Firmata e sigillata.

translation.en: Now to deliver all of these letters to Santa at the North Pole.
translation.it: Ora spediamo le lettere a Babbo Natale al Polo Nord.

translation.en: Hi! You must be Carrie!
You must be Mandy Mail. I'm so glad you're here!
translation.it: E tu Mandy la Postina. Grazie di essere qui.

translation.en: Well, I am the best.
So where's this super-special, extra-important delivery you've got for me?
translation.it: Dov'è questa consegna super speciale che hai per me?

translation.en: Right here!
Mail?!
[scoffs] I mean, I've delivered mail before. That doesn't seem very important.
translation.it: Consegno sempre lettere. Non sembra molto speciale.

translation.en: Oh! Every letter is important, especially...
translation.it: Oh, ogni lettera è speciale, soprattutto…

translation.en: Uh-oh! Another delivery! Gotta go! Thanks, Mandy!
So much for something super special and extra important.
translation.it: Alla faccia della consegna super speciale.

translation.en: [gasps] The town Christmas tree!
Now that is an important delivery! Perfect for me!
translation.it: Ecco una consegna importante. Perfetta per me!

translation.en: I mean, for us. Make way for Mandy Mail!
translation.it: Volevo dire, per noi. Fate largo a Mandy la Postina!

translation.en: Great decorating, everyone! OK, let's light this tree up.
translation.it: Begli addobbi, gente. Ok, accendiamo l'albero.

translation.en: Making the switch!
Wow! It's beautiful!
And I'm the one who delivered it!
And now it's almost time for the best part of Christmas!
translation.it: Si avvicina la parte migliore del Natale.

translation.en: Presents?
No. The big town party!
And then... Santa comes!
I sent a letter to Santa asking for a new bike.
translation.it: Nella lettera, io gli ho chiesto una bici nuova.

translation.en: Um, why does Diesel have my letter?
Uh, Mandy? Weren't you supposed to deliver these letters to Santa?
translation.it: Mandy, non dovevi portare le lettere a Babbo Natale?

translation.en: If Santa doesn't get our letters, the kids in Tracksville won't get presents!
translation.it: Senza le lettere, non porterà i regali ai bambini!

translation.en: We have to get these letters to the North Pole right away!
translation.it: Dobbiamo portarle subito al Polo Nord.

translation.en: Calling all trains! Please report to the Busy Board for today's Mega Mission!
translation.it: Treni a raccolta! Alla Bacheca delle Attività per la missione di oggi!

translation.en: It's Mighty Time!
Today's Mega Mission goes to...
translation.it: La mia scelta di oggi è ricaduta su…

translation.en: our newest team member, Mandy Mail!
translation.it: la nuova arrivata, Mandy la Postina!

translation.en: What? Really?!
Everybody deserves a second chance.
Delivering mail is what you do best, Mandy.
You'll go back and pick up the letters to Santa at Mail Station,
translation.it: Prenderai le lettere alla Stazione Postale

translation.en: then deliver them to the North Pole as fast as you can!
translation.it: e le consegnerai di corsa al Polo Nord!

translation.en: Mandy Mail never fails!
I guess delivering the letters to Santa is super special and extra important.
translation.it: Consegnare le lettere di Natale è super speciale.

translation.en: Mandy, it's time to...
-Clean up! -Tune up!
-Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
translation.it: - Ancoraggio! - Al ritmo della mia musica!

translation.en: ♪ It's time to clean up ♪
♪ It's time to tune up ♪
♪ It's time to hook up ♪
It's wash time! Break it down!
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub Rub, rub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub Rub, rub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ It's time to clean up ♪
-♪ It's time to tune up ♪ -It's tune-up time!
translation.it: Del fissaggio È l'ora del fissaggio!

translation.en: ♪ With Mighty Express ♪
Check! Check! Checkity-check-check!
And... you are Liza-certified!
translation.it: E adesso sei certificata da Liza!

translation.en: And now it's time to hook up with the mail carrier car!
translation.it: E ora agganciamo il vagone portalettere.

translation.en: All right, Mandy. Get the letters to Santa and save Christmas!
translation.it: Ok, Mandy. Consegna le lettere e salva il Natale.

translation.en: I will save Christmas!
Now you're ready to...
[all] Make tracks!
Make way for Mandy Mail!
translation.it: Fate largo a Mandy la Postina!

translation.en: [grunts] I don't know if all these letters will fit!
I think you need another train to help you.
translation.it: Serve aiuto da un altro treno.

translation.en: Help? No, no, no, no, no! I can save Christmas all on my own!
translation.it: Aiuto? No. Posso salvare il Natale da sola.

translation.en: But this is a lot of mail, Mandy. I don't want any letters falling out.
translation.it: Ma le lettere sono tante, Mandy. Neanche una deve andare perduta.

translation.en: Let me see if Max can send someone to help.
translation.it: Chiedo a Max di mandare qualcuno.

translation.en: Hi, Max! We need another train to help us cos there's a lot of mail here.
translation.it: Ciao, Max. Ci serve un altro treno. Le lettere sono troppe.

translation.en: I'll send Freight Nate. He loves to haul big loads.
translation.it: Ti mando Nate. Lui ama i grossi carichi.

translation.en: And Nico will come too, in case there are any problems with the track.
translation.it: E Nico, in caso di problemi con i binari.

translation.en: Come on... Close!
See? There! Don't need any help. Bye!
translation.it: Visto? Non mi serve nessun aiuto. Ciao!

translation.en: Mandy! Don't you want to wait for Nate and Nico?
translation.it: Mandy! Non vuoi aspettare Nate e Nico?

translation.en: We made it here fast, fast, faster!
But Mandy already left and she has too much mail to carry by herself!
translation.it: Ma Mandy è già andata e le lettere sono troppe per lei.

translation.en: Oh, no! This is a Christmas calamity!
translation.it: Oh, no! È una calamità natalizia!

translation.en: Let's catch up to Mandy and help!
Come in, Mandy. Nate and Nico are on their way to help!
translation.it: Resisti. Nate e Nico ti aiuteranno.

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm good. I can do it by myself!
translation.it: No, non serve. Posso farcela da sola.

translation.en: I'm going to be the one to save the super-special, extra-important Christmas delivery.
translation.it: Sarò io a salvare questa consegna di Natale super speciale.

translation.en: Mandy Mail never fails!
Whew! It's getting chilly! I'd better go faster to warm us up.
translation.it: Che freddo. Accelero, così ci scaldiamo.

translation.en: [both] Mandy! Slow down!
I never thought I'd say this, but I need...
translation.it: Non avrei mai pensato di dirlo, ma ho bisogno di aiuto!

translation.en: -Help! -[Flap squawks]
Don't worry, Mandy, we'll save you!
[Mandy] Hurry!
Mega grappling claw, activate!
Mega-stabiliser legs, activate!
Careful, Nate. According to my calculations, the ice we're on might...
translation.it: Attento. Secondo i miei calcoli, il ghiaccio…

translation.en: break!
I've got this!
Thanks for helping me!
No problem! The Mighty Express is always ready to help!
translation.it: Dovere! Il team è sempre pronto ad aiutare!

translation.en: That's what you call teamwork!
By the way, you dropped some letters.
Oh, no! I'm sorry. You know what?
translation.it: Oh, no! Mi dispiace. Sai, forse mi serve aiuto con questa consegna.

translation.en: I could use a little help with this delivery.
translation.it: Sai, forse mi serve aiuto con questa consegna.

translation.en: Happy to be of service!
Let's get these letters to Santa!
Chugga-chugga zoom!
Approaching North Pole Station!
translation.it: In arrivo alla Stazione del Polo Nord!

translation.en: Wow, look! Santa's Workshop!
translation.it: Wow, guardate! La fabbrica di Babbo Natale!

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Hello, Nico, Mandy, Flap and Nate!
translation.it: Oh, oh, oh! Ciao, Nico, Mandy, Flap e Nate.

translation.en: According to my calculations, it's Santa!
translation.it: Secondo i miei calcoli, è Babbo Natale!

translation.en: The real Santa! And he knows our names!
translation.it: Quello vero! E sa i nostri nomi!

translation.en: We've got a special delivery for you, Santa.
Thanks to some help from Nate, done and delivered!
translation.it: Grazie all'aiuto di Nate. - Consegna… - Effettuata!

translation.en: What's all this?
Letters from the kids in Tracksville telling you what they'd like for Christmas!
translation.it: Lettere natalizie dai bambini di BinarioCity.

translation.en: Hmm.
Is that a good "hmm" or a bad "hmm?"
Well, I'm afraid it's not good.
It's too late to make any more presents. It's time to make our deliveries!
translation.it: È tardi per fare altri regali. È ora di consegnarli.

translation.en: And there's a storm brewing!
We need to head out soon or we'll get caught in it!
translation.it: Dobbiamo partire presto, o ci travolgerà.

translation.en: But we came all this way! And the kids worked so hard on their letters!
translation.it: Ma siamo venuti fin qui. I bambini hanno scritto le lettere.

translation.en: And now they won't get presents?
I ruined Christmas!
There, there. You didn't ruin Christmas, Mandy.
translation.it: Calma. Non hai rovinato il Natale, Mandy.

translation.en: Christmas is about so much more than presents.
translation.it: A Natale, non contano solo i regali.

translation.en: Yeah. Like getting together with your family and friends.
translation.it: Conta anche stare in famiglia e tra amici.

translation.en: Friends! That's it!
What if we got our friends to come and help make presents for the kids?
translation.it: Chiediamo ai nostri amici di aiutarci.

translation.en: Well, we do have a little time.
translation.it: Beh, un po' di tempo c'è.

translation.en: With some help, we could make the toys we need.
translation.it: Col loro aiuto, possiamo fare i regali.

translation.en: Ha! Even Santa needs a little extra help sometimes. Ho, ho, ho!
translation.it: Pure a Babbo Natale serve una mano, a volte. Oh, oh, oh!

translation.en: OK, Mandy to Max. Come in, Max!
There you are!
Are you all right?
Yup! We got to the North Pole, but we've got a lot of presents to make.
translation.it: Sì, siamo arrivati al Polo Nord. Ma abbiamo tanti regali da fare.

translation.en: According to my calculations, it's gonna take a really long time!
translation.it: Secondo i miei calcoli, ci vorrà moltissimo tempo.

translation.en: We need your help!
We're on our way with Brock, Milo and Flicker.
translation.it: Veniamo subito con Brock, Milo e Flicker.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! This is where we make all the toys!
translation.it: Oh, oh, oh! Qui è dove costruiamo tutti i giocattoli.

translation.en: This place is amazing!
Thanks! I designed it myself. Tinsel-tastic, isn't it?!
translation.it: Grazie. L'ho progettato io. Strabiliante, vero?

translation.en: I hope help gets here soon!
-We made it! -Hi, Santa!
-Ho, ho, ho! Hello! -Thanks for coming.
Oh, my gosh, oh, my gosh, oh, my gosh! Santa! I'm a big fan!
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio! Babbo Natale! Sono un tuo grande fan.

translation.en: It's good to see you, too, Milo! I'm so glad you're all here!
translation.it: Piacere di vederti, Milo. Sono felice di avervi tutti qui.

translation.en: We have to hurry if we want to finish the toys before the storm hits!
translation.it: Costruiamo i giocattoli prima che arrivi la bufera.

translation.en: What's my job?
Mandy, you're in charge of wrapping the gifts. We brought your wrapping car.
translation.it: Mandy, tu incarterai i regali. Abbiamo l'incartatrice.

translation.en: Wrapping?! But what about making toys? I thought I'd get an important job.
translation.it: Incartare? Non farò i giocattoli? Volevo un compito speciale.

translation.en: You know, Mandy, when you're part of a team, every job is important.
translation.it: Sai, Mandy, in una squadra, ogni compito è speciale.

translation.en: All right, Santa. Then I'll be the best gift-wrapper who ever wrapped!
translation.it: Ok, Babbo Natale. Incarterò meglio che mai.

translation.en: I'll be a wrap star! [chuckles]
That's the spirit! Now let's ho, ho, go!
translation.it: Questo è lo spirito. Mettiamoci all'oh-oh-opera, prima che arrivi la bufera.

translation.en: Before that storm gets here!
translation.it: Mettiamoci all'oh-oh-opera, prima che arrivi la bufera.

translation.en: ♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express!

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best ♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express! Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.it: Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: ♪ It's a Tracksville Christmas ♪
♪ At the top of our wishlist ♪
♪ Is to have all of our friends And family here ♪
translation.it: Stare in famiglia e con gli amici

translation.en: ♪ It's the perfect time of year ♪ ♪ To spread that holiday cheer ♪
translation.it: È il momento perfetto Per diffondere la gioia

translation.en: ♪ And show the ones you love How much you care ♪
translation.it: Per mostrare ai tuoi cari Il bene che gli vuoi

translation.en: -[chuckles] -♪ Let's make a Mega Mission ♪ ♪ To spread that holiday cheer ♪
translation.it: Compiamo questa missione Per diffondere la gioia delle feste

translation.en: ♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express!

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best ♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express! Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.it: Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: ♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express!

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best ♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express! Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.it: Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: And that's a wrap on wrapping! [chuckles]
Ho, ho, ho! Jolly good work!
-[comms alert] -[Jubilee] Max!
Everything's set up for the party. How's it going at the North Pole?
translation.it: La festa è pronta. Come va al Polo Nord?

translation.en: We finished making the presents. Now we just have to deliver them.
translation.it: Abbiamo i regali. Dobbiamo solo consegnarli.

translation.en: Great! See you soon! Over and out.
translation.it: Ottimo. A presto! Passo e chiudo.

translation.en: [Santa] I don't like the look of those clouds.
Let's load up the sleigh so I can ho, ho, go before the storm hits.
translation.it: Carichiamo la slitta. Devo vo-oh-oh-lare prima della bufera.

translation.en: That's all the presents! Checkity-check!
translation.it: I regali ci sono tutti. Controllato!

translation.en: Let's hook up the reindeer!
Oh, no! The reindeer can't take off in this weather.
translation.it: Oh, no! Le renne non possono decollare con questo tempo.

translation.en: Does that mean no one will get Christmas presents this year?
I'm afraid not, Brock. If the reindeer can't pull the sleigh then...
translation.it: Temo di no, Brock. Se le renne non trainano la slitta…

translation.en: I can do it!
Uh, I mean... we can do it!
We're made of metal and strong enough to get through all that ice and wind!
translation.it: Siamo fatti di metallo. Sopportiamo neve e vento.

translation.en: We might need even more help.
Calling all trains! Please report to the North Pole.
translation.it: Treni a raccolta! Presentarsi al Polo Nord.

translation.en: Let's haul, y'all!
Rescue Red to the rescue!
Penny, set, go!
This is so exciting!
Ho, ho, ho! Thanks for your help, everyone.
translation.it: Oh, oh, oh! Grazie a tutti dell'aiuto.

translation.en: OK, Nico, where to first?
Our first delivery is to Bat Cave Tunnel to deliver these hats.
translation.it: Si va al Tunnel Pipistrello, a consegnare questi berretti.

translation.en: Then on, Red! On, Flicker! On, Penny!
translation.it: Andiamo, Red, Flicker, Penny, Milo, Mandy, Brock,

translation.en: On, Milo! On, Mandy! On, Brock!
On, Nate! And on, Faye!
And away we go! Ho, ho, ho!
[Jubilee] Come in, Max.
It's almost time for the Christmas party to start. How's it going?
translation.it: La festa sta per iniziare. Come procede?

translation.en: Well, we made it through the worst of the storm
translation.it: Il peggio della bufera è passato.

translation.en: but now we have to make the deliveries. And then we'll get there as fast as we can!
translation.it: Ora facciamo le consegne e poi corriamo da voi.

translation.en: OK! See you soon! Over and out.
translation.it: Ok, a presto! Passo e chiudo.

translation.en: [Max] Bat Cave Tunnel straight ahead.
Let's ho, ho, go!
Merry Christmas, my bat friends! Ho, ho, ho, ho!
translation.it: Buon Natale, amici pipistrelli. Oh, oh, oh!

translation.en: -Here you go! -Here you go!
-There you are! -Come and get 'em!
-[Liza] Here you go! -[Max] Here you are!
That'll keep 'em warm.
Now, let's deliver the rest of these presents.
translation.it: Ora consegniamo il resto dei regali.

translation.en: Oh, no! The storm got even worse!
translation.it: Oh, no! La bufera è peggiorata!

translation.en: We're snowed in!
But we have to get these presents to the kids!
It's OK, Flap. There's gotta be another way out of here.
translation.it: Calmo, Flap. Dev'esserci un'altra via d'uscita.

translation.en: [gasps] Look! Up there!
Yeah! But, uh, we'd have to fly!
[gasps] Excellent idea, Penny!
Um, Santa? According to my calculations, trains can't fly.
translation.it: Babbo Natale? Secondo i miei calcoli, i treni non volano.

translation.en: Let's see about that. Ho, ho, ho!
translation.it: Questo lo vedremo. Oh, oh, oh!

translation.en: I can use the same magic that makes my reindeer fly.
translation.it: Userò la magia che fa volare le mie renne.

translation.en: I'm not sure it'll work on trains, but I ho-ho-hope it does!
translation.it: Non so se funzionerà sui treni, ma spero-oh-oh di sì.

translation.en: Who wants to try first?
-Me, me, me! -All right, Mandy.
Now, get ready to... fly!
Or not.
I'm flying?! Yippee!
All right! Ho, ho, ho! Who's next?!
translation.it: Ottimo! Oh, oh, oh! Chi è il prossimo?

translation.en: [all] Me! Me! Me!
Where to now, Max?
Central Square Station!
Well, it's getting late.
I guess we'll just have to start the Christmas party without everyone.
translation.it: Inizieremo la festa senza di loro.

translation.en: No presents? It's the end of the world!
translation.it: Niente regali? È la fine del mondo!

translation.en: I hear trains! But where are they?
translation.it: Sento dei treni, ma dove sono?

translation.en: They're up! Wow!
-Ho! Ho! Ho! -Woo-hoo!
-All right! -Hooray!
This is a super-special, extra-important Christmas delivery!
translation.it: Questa è una consegna di Natale super speciale!

translation.en: [gasps] Santa?
Ho, ho, ho!
Santa!
Sorry we're late, Jubilee.
I'm just glad you made it!
The Christmas party wouldn't have been the same without you.
Mighty Express saved Christmas!
translation.it: La Mighty Express ha salvato il Natale!

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
-Snow, snow, snow! -It's snowing!
♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express!

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best♪
translation.it: Buone feste da BinarioCity! Mighty Express! Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.it: Tanti auguri Per le feste di quest'anno

translation.en: ♪ It's a Tracksville Christmas ♪
♪ At the top of our wishlist ♪
♪ Is to have all of our friends And family here ♪
translation.it: Stare in famiglia e con gli amici

translation.en: ♪ It's the perfect time of year ♪ ♪ To spread that holiday cheer ♪
translation.it: È il momento perfetto Per diffondere la gioia

translation.en: ♪ To show the ones you love How much you care ♪
translation.it: Per mostrare ai tuoi cari Il bene che gli vuoi
